column3: Go to the admin applications search page at /admin/applications
Select "Assign to editor group" from the "Bulk Edit Records" box

column4: A new pull-down box appears that says 'Start typing'

column3: Type the first few letters of an editor group

column4: The pull-down suggests possible values for you to enter

column3: Click on the small "x" in the pull-down box
Enter another value in the pull-down box

column4: A message banner appears which tells you your request has be queued

column3: Click on the link provided to see the background job that was created

column4: The background job opens in a new tab and only one task is shown.
The field suggestion_bulk_edit__editor_group contains the editor group you selected
The fields suggestion_bulk_edit__note and suggestion_bulk_edit__application_status are empty
The Submit button is inactive again
